author: Staff Reporter
text:
A day after Union Home Minister Rajnath Singh asked States to act against “Godse worshippers,” Hindu Mahasabha office-bearers on Friday told The Hindu that Mahatma Gandhi’s assassin would always be their hero.

“Who else would be our hero if not Nathuram Godse? It was because of him that the country did not see any more Partition unlike Pakistan. He did no wrong in killing Mahatma Gandhi,” said Pandit Ashok Sharma, national vice-president of the Akhil Bharatiya Hindu Mahasabha.

Mr. Sharma declared that Gandhi had no followers and the entire country followed Nathuram Godse.
title: Godse remains our hero, Hindu Mahasabha says
